
```{r}
stats<-read_csv("outputs/102/alignment-info.txt", col_names=c("Sample","Reads","Coverage"))
sub<-filter(stats, Reads > (325*200))
```


```{r,eval=FALSE}
test<-sub %>% slice_sample(n=100)
write_tsv(test, file="meta/test100.csv")
```

